metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21255 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In multiple functions of binder.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.
